definition.name: Licensed CI
definition.description: Ensure cached github/licensed license data is valid and up to date
definition.author: github

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: Access token to push license updates to GitHub

inputs.name: user_name
inputs.description: Name to use when pushing file changes

inputs.name: user_email
inputs.description: Email to use when pushing file changes

inputs.name: commit_message
inputs.description: Message to use when committing file changes

inputs.name: pr_comment
inputs.description: (Deprecated) Comment to add to a pull request, if one exists for the branch

inputs.name: workflow
inputs.description: Which workflow to run when metadata is updated.  See README for more details.

inputs.name: cleanup_on_success
inputs.description: Whether to close open PRs and delete license branches on CI success in user branch. Only used by `branch` workflow

inputs.name: branch
inputs.description: Branch to run the action on when using `workflow_dispatch` or `schedule` event triggers

inputs.name: dependabot_skip
inputs.description: Whether to add [dependabot skip] to license update commits resulting from Dependabot updates

inputs.name: sources
inputs.description: Set to a string containing a comma-separated list of github/licensed source name to add `--sources` CLI arguments to cache and status commands.

inputs.name: format
inputs.description: Set to `yaml` or `json` to add the `--format` CLI argument to cache and status commands.

outputs.name: licenses_updated
outputs.description: A boolean string indicating whether license files were updated.

outputs.name: pr_url
outputs.description: The html url of the pull request containing license updates, if available.

outputs.name: pr_number
outputs.description: The number of the pull request containing license updates, if available.

outputs.name: pr_created
outputs.description: True if a pull request was created in a `branch` workflow, false otherwise.
